column1: jumps from a back of a length and wide outside off, Short stays leg-side of the ball. He throws his bat at the ball and flays it up and over short third man off a thick outside edge
just short of a good length and angling into the hips, Short hangs back and works it to midwicket
on a length and outside off, Short has a crack at it and muscles it away to the left of mid-on for four. Not middled but Short won't mind
pitched up and outside off, no swing for Amir, Short reaches out for a drive and slices it away to backward point
dug in short and outside off, Short shapes to pull but ends up short-arm flapping it only as far as mid-on
on a length and nips back in slightly at off stump, Short presses forward and squirts it away in front of point

banged in short and outside off , Finch is rushed into a hook and hence top-edges it in the air over the leg side. Two men converge as the ball swirls away in the air. Malik and Amir are the fielders. It would have been a simpler catch for Amir, but Malik eventually lunges out for the ball and drops it. Finch dropped first ball in the final. What a play in Harare! How much will it cost Pakistan?
back of a length, fizzes back in and cramps the batsman for room. Big appeal for caught behind? Put down at slip by Ali. But it was off the thigh and not off the bat
shovelled from outside off to wide mid-on
Short backs away outside leg, swings and collects only fresh air
dug in short and outside off, Short brings out a pull and lifts the ball over square leg
short and cramps Finch for room, fended off the body to the leg side
back of a length and slanting away outside off with the angle from over the stumps, Finch gets on top of the ball and laces it away to the right of deep third man
on a length and angling across off, forced off the back foot to the covers
overpitched and outside off, slammed through the line to mid-off, where Malik fumbles after diving to his right and lets the ball away to the boundary
short on the hips, flapped away square on the leg side
back of a length and outside off, Finch taps it wide of point for a single
banged in short and zipping through the channel. Short swings for the hills... and misses
on a length and outside off, flashed to the covers
Ashraf hits a hard length on middle - neither cuttable nor pullable - dragged away to the leg side for one
back of a length and attacking the stumps, Short throws his hands at the ball again, loses his shape again, as the ball trickles back down the pitch. Short plays out his 10th dot
Short moves away outside leg even before Ashraf delivers it. The bowler bangs it down leg for a wide
short on leg stump, pings the mid-riff and rolls away in front of point. Beaten on the hook is Short
back of a length, angling in at off stump, then seaming away outside off, Finch nearly swings himself off his feet as he looks to club it over the midwicket boundary. Beaten lavishly in the end
back of a length and holds its line on off stump, Finch lines it up and successfully clubs it away wide of deep square leg. How's Shoaib Malik feeling?
short on the hips, fine leg is up inside the circle, swivels on the back foot and tickles a pull to the right of that fielder for four
short and fizzing through on the leg stump, Short scoops a leading edge to where short cover may have been
Short skips away outside leg, Hasan sends down a full-toss on his legs, Short misses out another scoring opportunity, especially with fine leg inside the circle. That should have been a four
slower short ball on middle, this offcutter is swiped away to deep square leg

Pakistan's fielding has been horrid this morning. Misfield at mid-on. Sarfraz is peeved. Back of a length and outside off, heaved across the line to mid-on, where Nawaz takes his eyes off the ball and earns the wrath of Sarfraz
banged in on middle, chest-hunting ball, cramps Finch for room, beats him for pace, and draws a top edge that swirls away from the keeper running back
short on the leg stump, Short picks up the length early. He rocks back and nails a pull over fine leg for six. After hooking, Short feels for his left side.
short on leg stump, pulled away to deep square leg now
just short of a good length on leg stump, and Finch swats it away like a fly to deep square leg. Just a single, though
Short jumps across off, gets inside the line of this length ball, and whips it with the wrists behind square
Top-edged away for six! Darted short and angling across off, Short is late on the hook and the ball sails away over the keeper's head. Fifty up for Australia in Harare
wide yorker, sneaks under the bat. Good finish to the over from Ashraf
Afridi hits a hard length and gets the ball to angle away outside off, Finch hops and jams to cover
full and sliding into the pads, squirted away to midwicket
Finch forays down the track, Afridi drags his length back and targets the body of the batsman. Top-edges it over fine leg's head for six
on a length and angling away outside off, Finch has a crack at it. And shovels in the air past the right of midwicket. The bottom hand doing all the work to generate strength

Finch ventures outside leg, Afridi chases him with a full dart, which is glanced away to short fine leg. The two batsmen risk a single. Short scoots off and slides his bat in. Even a direct hit might not have been enough
really full on middle stump, Short steps away outside leg, and crunches it away to sweeper cover
Short skips out right away and forces a shortish legbreak through square leg
back of a length and sliding away outside off from over the wicket, Short employs the latest of late cuts and sends the ball away fine of short third man for four
googly, breaks away outside off, Short picks it and lets it go
another googly, short and spins away outside off, dabbed away wide of short third man for one
good length and slides in at off, defended back. 'Very well bowled,' says Sarfraz from behind the stumps
Finch backs away outside leg and launches it with great authority of Sarfraz's head. Looped up wide outside off, Finch stays leg-side of the ball and hoists it for six
overpitched on leg stump, Short clears his front leg and blasts a single down to long-on
full and slanting outside leg, catches the thigh pad and wanders away in the direction of midwicket
Short keeps back to this incoming length ball and secures a single to square leg
another leg-stump ball, Finch misses out on a flick again
dug in short at the body, Finch now misses out on a hook, he was early into the shot, this was the change-up. Cops a blow on the chest
full on the stumps, driven away to cow corner, they decide against the second run
Finch stays leg-side of this legbreak outside off and stabs an inside edge to the bowler's right
looped up outside off, Finch drops down to one knee, sizes it up and clubs it over the long-on fielder for another six
flat dart just outside off, Finch can't get under it, ends up hacking it straight of long-on for a double
googly, short, clipped with the break to deep square leg

Finally Pakistan have caught one! Finch backs away outside leg even before Shadab delivers this legbreak outside off, this shortish ball spins away from Finch. He flays it in the air to Farhan, the debutant, who hangs onto the catch with both hands at cover. No fifty for the Finchmeister
sliding into the pads, clipped away to leg
Horrid fielding from Pakistan. Afridi is the culprit off his own bowling. Full on middle, played back, the bowler lazily lets it sneak through his hands
full and just a shade outside off, looks like a cutter that grips in the pitch and foils the timing, Short drags a heave but it does not carry to wide long-on
full-toss angling across off, Maxi carves it away to the right of deep third man. 100 up for Australia
full and nipping into the pads, inside-edged away to square leg as Maxwell does not get enough bat onto the leg-side flick
inswinging yorker, nearly storms through the defences of Short and takes the leg stump. Lucky to get away is Short
Short rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and steers a single down to deep third man
flatter wrong'un, spins away past the waft outside off
back of a length and outside off, another googly, Short has a crack at it and slashes an outside edge fine of short third man
Short dabs this from outside off to short third man. There's a mix-up between the wickets. Maxi asks his partner to undo his steps. Short slips but dishes out a full-length dive to make his crease
full and outside off, driven on the up to cover, where the fielder lets it through his legs. Short celebrates his return with a fifty and gets a hug from Maxi
opens the face and nurdles a single in front of point for one

Maxwell swings one straight into the lap of Ali at long-on. Pushed through on middle stump, Maxwell winds up and golf-swings it straight to the man in the deep. Two wickets in three overs for Pakistan
Hasan hits a hard length on middle and forces the batsman to jab it back to him

Dropped by Shadab at backward point. He throws himself to his right but the ball bursts out. Back of a length and outside leg following the moving batsman who chips a leading edge and continues to lead a charmed life
back of a length on middle stump, defended to the leg side off the back foot
pitched up and outside off, forward and drilled through the line to mid-off
lifter, slower ball, outside off, periscoped away to third man
short inducker, nips back in and cramps the batsman for room. Stoinis inside-edges the ball beside his feet
Short skips out, Shadab darts a googly outside off, stabbed into the covers
another googly, turns and bounces outside off past the cut. Sarfraz lets the ball bounce out of his gloves now
full googly outside off, slapped to mid-off
back of a length and breaks away outside off, lashed off the back foot to sweeper cover's right
Short camps back to this short googly and flashes another four fine of short third man for four
Short leans back to this skidder outside off and chops a risky single to short third man
really full on middle stump, clipped away to deep midwicket
middle-stump yorker, squeezed away to the left of deep square leg for two
slower offcutter outside off, toe-ended away to wide long-on
slower length ball outside off, punched away down to long-on
Short connects with this and middles a six over wide long-on. This was in his swinging arc - on a length and outside off - Short smites it away. Sarfraz shakes his head in disapproval
Short now jumps away outside leg, dragged shorter and outside off, Short stays leg-side of the ball and launches another six, this soars over Hasan's head
back of a length on middle stump, Stoinis lines it up and muscles it over midwicket for a huuuuuuuge six. Three successive sixes for Australia
slower cutter, floated wide outside off past the tramline. Sarfraz suggested a slower one but Amir's line is wrong
low full-toss on off, Stoinis clears his front leg and smears it away down the ground. The man at long-on dives across to his left to intercept this muscular drive
lifter, angling away outside off, Stoinis does not get any bat on the ramp

full-toss, angling away outside off, Stoinis is forced to reach out for the ball. He carves this low full-toss to sweeper cover, where Malik, after dropping Finch on 0 earlier in the morning, takes it with both hands
Head gets behind the line of this short ball on off and fends it back to Amir
full-toss, swinging in at off, clipped to long leg
full-toss wide outside off, sliced away to sweeper cover
on a length and outside off, Short flays it straight to cover. He stays leg-side of this ball and holes out to Farhan. No celebration from Afridi. Short lost his shape while meeting the ball
full and straight, Carey whips to deep square leg
really full and outside off, opens the face and squeezes it away between backward point and third man for four
overpitched and outside off, leans into a drive and places it to the right of mid-off for back-to-back fours
short and thuds in towards off stump, Head looks to pull but falls on the floor
Carey jumps across off for a lap-sweep but this ball it too short for the shot. Edges it away behind square
really full on middle, right in the slot, Head clears his front leg and walllllllllops it into the stands beyond midwicket. Brute power from Head
off-side wide. Re-set the radar, Ashraf
very full on middle, Head backs away and smears a single down the ground

Pakistan's fielding veers from ordinary to extraordinary. This rocket drive from Carey seemed destined to fly to the boundary. Instead, Shadab throws himself to his right from mid-off and plucks it out with one hand, inches from the ground. Simply sensational. This was very full and outside off, belted away in the air. Then came Shadab's athletic intervention. What a youtubeable catch. Awesome stuff, Shadab
back of a length and angling across off, jabbed to short cover
wide yorker, jammed to sweeper cover. And here comes the fumble. Perfectly sumps up Pakistan
mighty full on leg stump, backs away and squeezes a single square through the off side
middle-stump yorker, dug out to long-on
leg-stump yorker, jammed to deep third man now
Hasan hunts for the yorker again, but overpitches it on middle stump, Agar gets underneath the length and swings  a four over mid-off
beamer, slips out of the hand, flies over the ducking Agar to Sarfraz. No-ball, of course. It did not pitch at all, flies into the hands of the keeper
full and swinging away outside off, beats Agar's own swing
bowled'em. That's a bail trimmer. Good length on off stump, Agar swings for the hills... and does not get bat on ball. Hasan clips the off bail to cap his spell with a wicket
Australia continue to lose their way in the end over. Head holes out to long-on. On a length and outside off, Head swings and gets more height as opposed to distance
low full-toss slanting away outside off, scooped to mid-off for one
back of a length and zipping away outside off, Tye can't touch it
Killer yorker from Amir. It floors the middle stump. Ripper from over the wicket, storms under Tye's swinging bat. Can Australia reach 180?
full and angling across off, backs away and caresses it to sweeper cover

Yes, Australia go past 180. Fuller than a good length and slanting away wide outside off, Richardson, having skipped away outside leg, reached out for  the ball and carves a four fine of deep third man
flighted on off from round the wicket, driven down to long-off off the front foot

Duck for Farhan on T20I debut. What an unfortunate way to go, that too in your first international. Maxwell slides a full ball down the leg side, draws the batsman out of the crease, Farhan falls over, and the keeper whips the bails off. Stumped off a leg-side wide
lobbed up outside off, encourages the batsman to drive and goes past the outside edge
pushed through on off stump, forward and tipped to the covers

Maxwell strikes twice in the first over with the new ball. Talat also gone for a duck. Maxwell tosses up this outside off and gets it to break away. Talat drives a long way away from the body and slices a catch to backward point. Dream start to the defence for Maxwell and Australia
full on pads from round the stumps, glanced to fine leg
dropped short and outside off, Zaman reaches out for the ball and flashes to point
runs in hard, finds extra bounce to send the ball screaming past the outside edge right away
back of a length and snaking in on off, Sarfraz hops, skips, and fends it away to the leg side
wide of the crease, holds its line outside off, Sarfraz angles it down to deep third man
lifter on leg stump, gets big on Zaman, and beats the hook
back of a length on leg stump, Zaman gets behind the line and pushes a single to the covers
back of a length and bounces over middle stump as Sarfraz hoicks to the leg side and misses
tossed up at off, dips, skewed in the air over extra cover
darted outside off, drilled down the ground past the left of Maxwell for a powerful four
back of a length and breaks away outside off, Zaman skips away outside leg, creates additional room and carts it up and over extra cover
Zaman runs down the track and hacks a short ball from middle down to long-on
Sarfraz jumps away outside leg, this is tossed on his legs. Sarfraz goes low and slugs a slog-sweep over midwicket
Sarfraz jumps outside leg again, meets a short ball outside off and flays it square through the off side for another boundary
Zaman steps away outside leg, this is on a length and outside off, the batsman stays leg-side of the ball and pumps it over the covers. Pakistan's chase is on
Zaman backs away outside leg and stabs a shortish ball to point
Sarfraz aims for a cut,  but Stanlake hits the splice with a short ball. It rolls away to point
back of a length and on a fifth-stump line, Sarfraz backs away and looks to go over the covers. No dice. Beaten on the outside edge
Sarfraz hangs deep in the crease, picks a short ball from outside off and pulls it away to the long-on fence
pitched up and outside off, punched up to Tye at mid-on for one
back of a length on a fourth-stump line, opens the face and punches to cover
back of a length, angling in, straightening away as Sarfraz wafts and misses in the channel
Sarfraz makes room outside leg but is beaten by this zippy short ball chasing him
back of a length and seaming away, another swish and a miss. Four dots on the bounce
back of a length on a fourth-stump line, spanked away. Stays leg-side of the ball and sends it up and over extra cover with a flourish
picked off the hips wide of short fine leg for one
slower ball, short and outside off, Sarfraz reads the change-up and drags it away to the wide long-on boundary. Shot, Safi

on a length and outside off, Sarfraz knows fine leg is up, he scoops it away over short fine leg. Nice shot but harebrained running between the wickets. Richardson swoops down on the ball, slides, hauls it in, and the throw comes to the bowler, Sarfraz is caught napping on the third. He was so very late to take off. Lazy running
short on leg stump, flapped away to short fine leg
back of a length and outside off, punched back to the bowler
slower ball on off, chipped past the left of the bowler
short knuckle ball, Malik is early into his shot and wears it on the body
dipping full-toss on leg stump, dug out
banged short and outside off, chops a cut to the covers
Zaman leans back and chops a short ball from outside off to backward point
back of a length and angling into a dab to point
back of a length and angling in on off, opens the face and plays it behind to the keeper
back of a length on off, tapped to point
Zaman jumps away outside leg, takes a length ball and plants it into the stands beyond wide long-on. Muscled away
back of a length on the hips, Zaman flicks his wrists and sends the ball to the square-leg boundary
slower ball, beaten outside off
slower offcutter, punched up to backward point
slower, short ball on middle, swivel-pulled to short fine leg. Another offcutter from Stoinis
Malik gets off the mark after seven balls with a pull shot to long-on
full on middle from round the wicket, bunted away to long-on
short, angling away, leans back and punches in the gap at point
Malik comes down the track, Maxwell fires it short and wide outside off, chopped away to point
off-stump yorker, jammed down to long-on
tossed on middle, eased away between wide long-on and deep midwicket
back of a length on middle, this hip-high ball is merrily swatted away over backward square leg for a one-bounce four. Bam!
Malik moves outside leg, back of a length and wide outside off, past the reach of Malik
full on middle stump, push-driven down to long-on
Zaman backs away outside leg, the bowler follows him with a bouncer, the opener carefully ducks under it
picked off the pads to fine leg
back of a length and outside off, smoothly punched to sweeper cover
full on middle, backs away and smears it to extra cover, where Wildermuth fumbles
tucked off the hips to the right of deep square leg for four. Poor line from Wildermuth to follow the fumble at cover
full and angling in on middle, tipped away to square leg
slower short ball outside off, Zaman cuts and misses in the corridor, throwing his hands at the ball
short and wide outside off, looks like another slower ball, but it's well past the tramline
short, wide, reaches out for the ball with his hands and carves it away behind point. The ball thuds into the boundary. Zaman loves it there
darted short and too wide outside off, another off-side wide from Wildermuth
very full and very wide outside off, Zaman flits around in the crease, throwing the bowler off
back of a length and angling away outside past the tramline. Yet another off-side wide
back of a length and angling away close to off, punched up to backward point. The fielder has a shy at the non-striker's end and concedes an overthrow
Zaman throws his hands a wide one and smears it to sweeper cover to round out the 10-ball over
full just outside off. Spinning into Fakhar, and he swipes at it across the line. Thumped to long on
full on leg stump, and Malik opens his stance to drive to cover
straight as an arrow! Full outside off, and he comes dancing down the wicket before drilling it over Agar's head! Enough width for him to smack this flat-batted for a maximum. Fifty too
full outside off, and once again Fakhar comes down the wicket. Mistimes a thump over the non-striker's head, but still has enough legs to crash into the boundary. Ten off two balls
drilled! Full on leg stump, but Fakhar expected that. Backs away to the leg side, and then slaps this past Malik for a boundary. Almost took the non-striker out
full and fast outside off stump. Fakhar lets it go, and the ball hits the keeper's pads. The ball trickles away to point for extras
full outside off, but it's the slower ball from Tye. Waits for the ball to get to him, before slapping a late cut past the keeper's left
cheeky! Slower ball outside off again, and Fakhar shuffles across to the leg side, and scoops a pull over square leg for more runs
yorker outside off, and Fakhar digs this down the ground to long off for a quick single
up and over! Short on off, and Malik tries to pull. Through his shot too early, and it's been top-edged over Carey. Leaking runs now
slower ball, but on a length outside off. Malik opens his bat's face and pushes to point with soft hands
low full toss on off, and that's been driven to long off for one. Malik wanted two, but Fakhar says no
Fakhar moves away outside leg, Stanlake chases him with a full ball that grazes the pad and squirts away to fine leg
short and just a shade outside off, Malik gets up on his tippy toes and rides it down to deep third man's right
short and wide outside off, Zaman jumps outside leg and flays it up and over backward point. Thumped into the deserted stands
Jumps away outside leg and stabs it to the leg side
short and skips back in, fended to the covers off the back foot
Malik backs away, leg-stump yorker, dug back
Zaman gets on top of a short ball outside off and firmly cuts it away to sweeper cover
offcutter outside off, whipped away to deep midwicket
full-toss outside off, driven sweetly to sweeper cover
slower bouncer on middle, swatted away to long leg
short and wide outside off, Zaman stays leg-side of the ball again, and pummels it away to the cover fence. Flat-bats this offcutter into oblivion
slower, short ball outside off, crunched away. Agar overruns the ball and gives up four. Nothing going Australia's way
full on the stumps, laced down to long-on
leg-side wide
back of a length on off, Malik sits back in the crease and chops the ball away to point
leans back and chops this short ball much finer to third man
slower cutter on middle, run away to point
back of a length on middle, flipped away to deep square leg for one

Zaman holes out to deep backward point. No hundred for him. Zaman shows his cards early and steps away outside leg. The bowler goes shorter and wider outside off. Zaman still reaches out for the ball and slices underneath the ball in the air but straight down the throat of Maddinson, the sub
back of a length and nips away outside off past the outside edge
fullish on off, dropped to the covers
back of a length and outside off, Ali slogs and misses
full on middle and leg, tapped down to long-off for one now
turned to the leg side for one
Asif aims to mow a length ball over midwicket but is beaten by extra bounce in the corridor
length ball on off stump, Malik lines it up and smokes it over the midwicket boundary. Such a smooth swing
near yorker on middle, squeezed away to long-on
slower ball outside off, driven hard to long-off
banged in short on middle, shovel-pulls to deep square leg
slower ball outside off, pulled away straight of long-on. Finch slides to his left and parries the ball to long-off
nice and full on off - right in the slot - Asif Ali gets underneath the length and slams it straight over the bowler's head like a boss. The slower ball has been dispatched into the stands
full on middle stump, Malik backs away outside leg and smears it over point for four
shuffles outside leg and nurdles a single past short fine leg
Ali bunts a full ball on middle to long-on
Malik backs away outside leg and digs out a yorker to the keeper
slog-swept away to deep fine leg
middle-stump yorker, jammed down to long-on for a couple of runs. Pakistan another couple away from victory
back of a length and outside off, muscled away to long-on
Pakistan clinch the tri-series in Zimbabwe! Back of a length and outside off, slower offcutter from Stoinis, Asif Ali reads it and slugs it away wide of deep midwicket for four
